caption.center: HOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF EL PASO/VICTORIA PEREA,
Appellant/Appellee, v. VICTORIA PEREA/HOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Eighth District, El Paso.

opinion.posture: Appeal from 168th District Court of El Paso County, Texas, (TC # 2005-4563).
opinion.panel: Before CHEW, C.J., McCLURE, and CARR, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Pending before the Court is a joint motion to set aside the trial court's judgment and remand for entry of an agreed judgment pursuant to Tex.R.App.P. 42.1(a)(2)(B). The motion is granted. We therefore set aside the trial court's judgment without regard to the merits and remand the cause to the trial court for rendition of judgment in accordance with the parties' agreement. We further order costs be assessed against the party incurring same.
